title: Tyson Foods stock drops after earnings outlook is cut
text: Tyson Foods Inc. TSN, +0.27% shares fell in the extended session Tuesday after the company said a variety of conditions was forcing it to lower its guidance for the year. Tyson shares fell 5.6% after hours, following a 0.3% rise to close at $93.29 in the regular session. The company forecast adjusted full-year earnings of $5.30 to $5.70 a share, down from a previous forecast of $5.75 to $6.10 a share. Analysts surveyed by FactSet had forecast earnings of $5.93 a share. "These challenges include margin compression related to a reversal of a gain on mark to market grain derivatives recognized in our third quarter, commodity market volatility, implementation of enhanced food safety initiatives, a beef processing plant fire, and slower than expected operational improvements in the chicken segment," the company said in a statement.
